EmailTemplate.subject: Feedback Rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your Feedback Has Been Rejected
Your Feedback Has Been Rejected
Dear {!User.Name},
Thank you for your feedback. Unfortunately, your feedback has been rejected and will not be published. We appreciate your understanding and encourage you to share your thoughts again in the future.
Best regards, Parenting Hub
